title: bootstrap crashes in debug mode

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
repo is at a2b991b5305b770c7d5288ab3aa231428511c530

this is my config.toml:
````toml
[llvm]
[build]
full-bootstrap = true
extended = true
tools = ["cargo", "rls", "rustfmt", "analysis", "src"]
sanitizers = true
profiler = true
low-priority = true
[install]
[rust]
debug = true
debug-assertions = true
debuginfo = true
debuginfo-lines = true
backtrace = true
verbose-tests = true
lld = true
llvm-tools = true
lldb = true
backtrace-on-ice = true
verify-llvm-ir = true
[target.x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu]
[dist]
````
while buidling, rustc crashed

